summary:
This gives you all the Starting skills , Powers , Effects of all the default races in skyrim
if you are an Perfectionist like me then this is your Thing.
Also this is not a mod its a Bat File
descriptionHtml:
What does this do:
It gives you only the best Starting skills by race
It gives you all Starting spells by race
It gives you all Unique Race Powers
It gives you all Unique Racial Effects

Installation:
Since this is a normal bat file you dont install this with NMM
you just put the text file in your skyrim folder For example
C:\Program Files\Steam\SteamApps\common\Skyrim for me.
By default its called Master_Race so ingame you type (in console) Bat Master_Race
And it will automaticly add everything
Have fun being a Completionist.
author: Mondkind
